La cooperación continúa temporalmente, ahora en ambientes forestales y con batallas bélicas superiores a las de Half-Life 2, reapareciendo también la conducción que puede ser de gran ayuda. Esta expansión nos revela más cosas sobre el Lore de una manera sutil y misteriosa característica de la saga, hilando muchos cabos sueltos de los juegos previos y contando con un final trágico como excelente. Superior a Half-Life 2.

otra excelente expansión de la historia de HL2, un poco mas larga que el episodio 1, ahora solo nos queda rogar para que salga el episodio 3 y HL3, ya que nos dejan con muchas incógnitas, personalmente quiero saber si Gordon le dará nietos a Eli XD

O terceiro jogo do game segue a qualidade de seus antecessores, mas acredito que, dos dois anteriores, esse possui o melhor desfecho. É um puta jogo que deve ser jogado. A análise do primeiro HL 2 se mantém neste
Análise HL2: Outro jogo revolucionário em seu lançamento, sendo considerado, corretamente, um dos melhores jogos do PC. Um dos poucos que entra em minha classificação de “masterpiece” assim como o primeiro. Gráfico, física, diálogos, personagens tudo muito bom e bem feito. Com certeza um título obrigatório para que se considera “PC MASTER RACE”

Reviewing games I played a long time ago:

It's a major step up compared with Episode 1 in everyway, with a bigger focus on narrative, interesting and diverse setpieces and overall stronger gameplay. It's still a bit too short and the sense of isolation is completely gone now since we are almost always fighting alongside a companion IA. But overall it ends well the HL2 saga, although with a cliffhanger.

This is an intense, heartbreaking, interactive story about a gnome who's carried around by a mute, shoved into a rocket, and shot into space. You will shed more tears than ever before, in what will likely be, simultaneously, the biggest waste of time, and your greatest achievement.

I just finished the game for the first time before writing this review and I have to say that HL2: episode 2 is one of the best games I have ever played. It is probably my favorite game in the half life series (with the exception of maybe HL:Alyx since i haven't played it yet). The half life universe has something special about it, I love the story, levels, characters, and pretty much everything else about it. The game is put together very well. The graphics were AAA for the year it was made and they still hold up pretty well by today's standards. I really hope that I will get to see an episode 3 or HL3 before I die, this cliffhanger will keep me thinking about this for a long time. A truly exceptional game, please don't overlook the HL series.
